mapper.sql: sys_manager.m_id as id,sys_manager.m_name as name,sys_manager.m_nickname as nickname,sys_manager.m_loginname as loginname,sys_manager.m_password as password,sys_manager.m_salt as salt,sys_manager.m_create_date as createDate,sys_manager.m_update_date as updateDate,sys_manager.m_is_delete as isDelete,sys_manager.m_status as status,sys_manager.m_su_admin as suAdmin
